metadata.title: CVE-2024-1742 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Invocation of the sqlplus command with sensitive information in the commandline in the mk_oracle Checkmk agent plugin before Checkmk 2.3.0b4 (beta),2.2.0p24, 2.1.0p41 and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows the extraction of thisinformation from the process list.

criterions.comment: check-mk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
